title: DDFP 249: Adrian Peterson, Malcolm Jenkins & movies
itunes:title: DDFP 249: Adrian Peterson, Malcolm Jenkins & movies
description:
Shek welcomes new Eagles safety Malcolm Jenkins into Studio 66 to kibitz about his new team, the food in New Orleans he'll now have to do without, Jimmy Graham's greatness, and surviving a zombie apocalypse. Bald Bryan Bishop of the Adam Carolla podcast & author of "Shrinkage: Manhood, Marriage, and the Tumor That Tried To Kill Me" is also in to talk about his 49ers, Trojans, surviving a brain tumor, and share his master list of actor redundancies. Plus, take a listen to a 1-on-1 interview with Adrian Peterson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
